label: Cassava yield '05
description: Spatially disaggregated production statistics of circa 2005 using the Spatial Production Allocation Model (SPAM). Values are for 5 arc-minute grid cells.
source: You, L., U. Wood-Sichra, S. Fritz, Z. Guo, L. See, and J. Koo. 2014. Spatial Production Allocation Model (SPAM) 2005 v2.0.
citation: HarvestChoice, 2015. "Cassava Yield (kg/ha, 2005)", International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington, DC., and University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN. Available online at http://harvestchoice.org/data/cass_y.
